function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of the disease through shared facilities and units","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in public places","Mitigation":"Restricting the use of shared facilities and devices","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purification devices","People":"General public, visitors to public places","Owner":"Local authorities, facility management"},{"Description":"Dependency on essential urban systems and primary services","Impact":"Pressure on secondary public facilities and services","Mitigation":"Closing non-essential public places and services","Technologies":"Remote access technology, online services","People":"Local community, public service providers","Owner":"Local government, public service providers"},{"Description":"Closure of non-essential public places","Impact":"Disruption of public activities and services","Mitigation":"Minimizing use of secondary public places","Technologies":"Automated systems, self-service kiosks","People":"Visitors to non-essential public places","Owner":"Owners of non-essential public places"}]}
